actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Healthy Families and Communities

official_title: To provide for the Secretary of Education to study and report on the marketing of foods and beverages in middle and high schools.
short_title: Food Marketing in Schools Assessment Act

summary.text: Food Marketing in Schools Assessment Act - Directs the Secretary of Education to study and report to the Congress on the marketing of food and beverages in middle and high schools. Requires such study to assess the nutritional quality of such foods, the media through which they are marketed to children in such schools, and mechanisms that regulate such marketing. Directs the Secretary to collaborate in the conduct of such study with the Division of Adolescent and School Health of the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention.

titles.title: Food Marketing in Schools Assessment Act
To provide for the Secretary of Education to study and report on the marketing of foods and beverages in middle and high schools.
